block.formulaText:
cms.PageExp.Local('root', cms.PageExp.RelContextRoot());
cms.PageExp.Local("operatorID", cms.Yigo2MidExp.GetLoginOperator());
cms.PageExp.Local(
    "data",
    cms.DataExp.QueryList("
        select * from (select 
			Topic as COL1,em.Name as COL4,BillCreatTime as COL2,BPM_Migration.billoid as oid,BPM_Instance.formkey
			from WF_Workitem
			join WF_Participator on WF_Workitem.WorkitemID=WF_Participator.WorkitemID 
			join BPM_Log on WF_Workitem.WorkitemID=BPM_Log.WorkitemID 
			join bpm_workiteminfo on wf_workitem.WorkitemID=bpm_workiteminfo.WorkitemID 
			join BPM_Instance on  BPM_Log.instanceID=BPM_Instance.instanceID
			join BPM_Migration on  BPM_Instance.OID=BPM_Migration.BillOID
            join oa_employee_h  em on em.OID=BPM_Migration.EmpID 
			where WF_Participator.OperatorID=${operatorID} order by UrgencyDeg desc,BillCreatTime asc) h limit 7
    ")
);
cms.PageExp.Local(
    "bccount",
    oa.TodoMidExp.ReadCount(cms.PageExp.Local("operatorID"), "todolist", "")
);
block.tmplText:
#foreach( $line in $data )

  • $esc.html($line.COL1)

    发起人:$esc.html($line.COL4)$esc.html($line.COL2)

    • #end
